attributes.action: Restore Britain To Great Britain as it once was
attributes.additional_details: When in 1940 we were in fear of annihilation from Germany near the beeches of Dunkirk, what did King George VI and Churchill do which saved over 350,000 of our men? They called for a National Day of prayer to the Creator God and immediately the situation turned round. Let us restore our Nation again to be Great Britain and cry out to The God of Abraham Isaac and Jacob he never changes. He rescued us then let's ask Him to rescue us again? This may be Britain's last chance. Sign we me as Churchill did so can we?Lord God help us in our time of dire need.
